statements: SELECT * FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics
SELECT content_id, views FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics WHERE views > 100
SELECT content_id, shares FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics ORDER BY shares DESC
SELECT content_id, engagement FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics WHERE engagement > 0.5
SELECT * FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics WHERE views < 50 ORDER BY engagement
SELECT * FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics WHERE content_id='3a3e8d1c-6c17-45c1-a5e9-733e40c8e970';
SELECT content_id, views FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics WHERE shares > 100 ORDER BY views DESC;
SELECT AVG(engagement) AS avg_engagement FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics;
SELECT content_id, views, shares, engagement FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics WHERE views < 50 AND shares < 20;
SELECT content_id, shares, engagement FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics WHERE engagement > 0.5 ORDER BY shares DESC;
SELECT * FROM content_performance_metrics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT content_name, views FROM content_performance_metrics WHERE views > 100;
SELECT content_name, shares FROM content_performance_metrics ORDER BY shares DESC;
SELECT content_name, engagement FROM content_performance_metrics WHERE views < 50 AND shares > 10;
SELECT content_name, views, shares FROM content_performance_metrics WHERE views > 50 ORDER BY shares ASC;
SELECT * FROM content_performance_metrics WHERE views > 100 ORDER BY shares DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT content_name, SUM(views) AS total_views FROM content_performance_metrics GROUP BY content_name HAVING total_views > 1000 ORDER BY total_views DESC
SELECT content_name, views, shares FROM content_performance_metrics WHERE engagement BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY engagement DESC
SELECT content_name, views, shares FROM content_performance_metrics WHERE engagement > 50 AND shares > 10 ORDER BY views DESC, shares ASC
SELECT * FROM user_metrics JOIN content_performance_metrics ON user_metrics.content_id = content_performance_metrics.id WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY views DESC
SELECT content_name, views, shares FROM content_metrics
SELECT * FROM user_metrics WHERE user_name = 'Alice'
SELECT platform_name, total_engagement FROM platform_metrics ORDER BY total_engagement DESC
SELECT id, platform_name FROM platform_metrics WHERE platform_type = 'Social Media'
SELECT SUM(total_views) AS total_views_sum FROM user_metrics
SELECT content_name, views, shares, engagement FROM content_metrics
SELECT platform_name, total_views, total_shares, total_engagement FROM platform_metrics ORDER BY total_views DESC
SELECT user_name, total_shares, total_engagement FROM user_metrics WHERE total_shares > 1000
SELECT content_name, views, shares, engagement FROM content_metrics WHERE views BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT platform_name, platform_type, total_engagement FROM platform_metrics WHERE platform_type = 'Social Media'
SELECT * FROM content;
SELECT id, title, views FROM content ORDER BY views DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT content_id, share_timestamp FROM shares ORDER BY share_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM views WHERE viewer_id = 1000;
SELECT id, title, views, shares, engagement FROM content WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM content WHERE views > 100 ORDER BY engagement DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT content_id, viewer_id, view_timestamp FROM views WHERE content_id = 2 ORDER BY view_timestamp DESC;
SELECT shares.content_id, sharer_id, share_timestamp, title FROM shares JOIN content ON shares.content_id = content.id;
SELECT * FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics;
SELECT ContentTitle, Views FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics ORDER BY Views DESC;
SELECT ContentTitle, EngagementScore FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics WHERE Views > 1000;
SELECT ContentTitle, Shares FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics WHERE Shares > 50 ORDER BY Shares DESC;
SELECT ContentTitle, EngagementScore FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics WHERE EngagementScore > 8.5;
SELECT ContentTitle, Views, Shares FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics WHERE Views > 100 AND Shares > 10
SELECT ContentTitle, EngagementScore FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics ORDER BY EngagementScore DESC
SELECT UserName, TotalViews FROM UserMetrics WHERE TotalViews < 50 ORDER BY TotalViews ASC
SELECT SiteName, TotalEngagement FROM SiteMetrics WHERE TotalEngagement > 500 ORDER BY TotalEngagement DESC
SELECT c.ContentTitle, t.TagName FROM ContentTags t JOIN ContentTagMapping m ON t.TagID = m.TagID JOIN ContentPerformanceMetrics c ON m.ContentID = c.ID
